name: Lucid Dream (itch) (WeekDev)
description:
A short horror experience.

You've been having a recurring lucid dream every week and today is no exception. When you wake up, you're not sure if you're still dreaming or not.

However, you know that you need to check out that vent because it's been making strange noises every night. Lucid dream or not, you decide to go check it out.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, DMoveMouseLookLeft mouse button (LMB)GrabRight mouse button (RMB)ThrowCTRLCrouchSpaceJumpEInteract

This game was made in a week as part of my "Game in a week" challenge.
